TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DLStringComparer extends System.StringComparer

Docs.summary: This class and its members are reserved for internal use and are not intended to be used in your code. Represents a distribution list string comparison operation that uses specific case and culture-based or ordinal comparison rules.

Docs.summary: This member is reserved for internal use and is not intended to be used directly from your code.Compares two distribution list strings and returns an indication of their relative sort order.
Docs.returns: ValueMeaningLess than zerox is less than y.-or-x is null .Zerox is equal to y.Greater than zerox is greater than y.-or-y is null .

remarks.para: This override compares the hash codes that are generated from the first 30 characters of the distribution list strings of the two parameters.

Docs.summary: This member is reserved for internal use and is not intended to be used directly from your code. Specifies that the length used to generate the hash code for distribution list string comparison is 30 characters.
